item.description:
Bring your blankets and lawn chairs for exciting music on the mountain featuring some of the finest in local, regional and national performers.
Great food, brews, a variety of vendors including an environmental expo, and our scenic stage area make this the best concert for all music fans.

To Purchase Tickets please call customer service: 978-464-2300 ext 3200

MusicFest Sat. Sept 6, 2008 1:00 pm - 7:00 pm

Featuring: The Outlaws, Pure Prairie League, Whiskey Falls

ADMISSION- MusicFest Advanced $15 Door $20
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at 12:20 to 12:40 at sign to left of lodge door, in front of pond.
item.name: MusicFest at Mt. Wachusett
